Reviews.Title: HP
Reviews.Author: Matthew
Reviews.Content: Right off the bat I notice the super thin and sleek textured design. Looking around, I see 3 usb inputs. The Touchpad is accented with with a texture to make it easier to drag your fingers, the touch-pad also has firm mouse buttons which help you from clicking things by accident. The keys are thin but firm,tight, and well made. For the price this was a steal, most sites have this product set between $559.99 - $659.99. I was looking for power on a budget, and I got that with the Quad Core A6, along with the 6GB of Ram. Also I noticed this Laptop has a AMD Radeon HD 8400 graphics with up to 3053MB total graphics memory that is not listed in this products description on here. The 8400 is the best in the 8000 Series so that was also a steal. Visit AMD's graphics website if you want to know what a Series is. Also, If I left anything out just comment and I'm sure I can get back to you.Full time college Student

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop!!
Reviews.Author: Kyndra's mommie
Reviews.Content: I purchased this laptop so i could do my college online classes! I love how fast it is, how easy it is to type and LOVE the touch pad! I can do homework and be able to go out of town without the worry of finding somewhere to check my classes or do homework and submit it with ease!! This would also be a great personal use computer also as i do use it for school and personal use!! GREAT PURCHASE EXTREMELY SATISFIED!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Well worth the money!
Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: I just got this today have been on it for less then a half an hour and I already love it, worth the money. I had recently tried someone's ASUS laptop and hated it! I love HP laptops I previously owned one and had it for over 2 years and it's still going they are well worth the money!

Reviews.Title: Quite satisfied
Reviews.Author: Pinecone
Reviews.Content: I returned a poor-quality Toshiba Satellite for this HP Pavilion and am much more satisfied with the HP.PROS:Crisp, clear displayExcellent sound through the speakers---the best I've ever heard on a laptop.Excellent keyboard. I type all day for my work and really like this keyboard.AppearanceI was skeptical at first about the AMD Quad Core, knowing that there were better processors. But I've had no trouble at all with the AMD. I use my laptop for tons of MS Word processing, photos, internet research,  and watching movies. No games. For those uses the AMD is fine.CONS:1. The screen seems to have more glare than my previous laptop, to the point of significant eye strain.2. I've had Windows 8.1 professionally installed on two laptops recently. There were no problems with the first one (on a Toshiba Satellite). Things didn't go as well with this HP Pavilion. I spent several days working out bugs after the installation. I've had an internet connectivity problem from the beginning and have not been able to solve it after a lot of research. I don't know  whether this is actually  a hardware problem. I'm only saying that there were far more problems with the HP installation and some unsolved bugs.

Reviews.Title: Hate the OS
Reviews.Author: Labrat
Reviews.Content: Computer was received in a timely manner with no problems. The problem seems to be Windows 8. Very cumbersome and non user friendly. Like wise it drops my internet connection on a regular basis. I like my 8 year old Dell with Vista better than this. Oh well at least I didn't spend a fortune but still.

Reviews.Title: Super Computer for the Money
Reviews.Author: Janice
Reviews.Content: I am really happy with this computer. I had to get rid of the spyware that comes with it that seemed to be bogging it down terribly and I had to get a program called Start8 that makes everything look like Windows 7 because I did not like Windows 8, but now that I have my programs and files and have completely moved from the old, failing computer to the new one, I am super super happy with everything about it. I bought my last HP 4 years ago for 50% more than this one and it was a refurb. I love that the prices are coming down so much.

Reviews.Title: good computer
Reviews.Author: steventheo69
Reviews.Content: Good computer but only usb port and comes unplugged easily. Also the touch pad isn't in the middle causing me to right click a lot. Some keys were hard to get response from when new but are fine now.

Reviews.Title: I think it's great
Reviews.Author: Kevin Greene
Reviews.Content: This computer is nice and seems to be what I was looking for. The only complaint I have is that some keys seem to stick or automatically register too many letters but otherwise it's running really good. It also take a little longer than I thought it would to start up

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Mary Ann Evans
Reviews.Content: We were very happy with the purchase of our new computer.  The reviews posted were pretty accurate and very helpful. Definitely recommend this laptop.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop
Reviews.Author: ckmia "ckmia"
Reviews.Content: Does exactly what it's supposed to. Fast  lightweight and luckily all elements on the keyboard are i convenient places. That's all I ask for these days.
